item1: FHCs generally can engage broader range financial related activities than otherwise permissible BHCs long they continue meet eligibility requirements FHCs. broader range permissible activities FHCs includes underwriting, dealing making markets securities making investments non-FHCs (merchant banking activities). addition, certain FHCs, including us, permitted engage certain commodities activities U.S. may otherwise impermissible BHCs, so long assets held pursuant these activities do not equal 5% more consolidated assets.
